item.title: exercism.io
item.description: 14:30 Monday 01 May 2017 JST https://exercism.io/ looks interesting enough that I plan to create a subdirectory on my Vagrant box that I’ve been using to spin up new AB, CB, and FS servers on AWS. BUT, time limit for fing around with this is 1 hour. https://e.ggtimer.com/60minutes ready スタート!! 14:52 Finished the Pythonic hello world. https://exercism.io/submissions/8cb0470f7aa7463cbfd8020b21c5b632 Just as I got interrupted by work.
